input.sentences: the smiths have been having hard times so neighbors often drop things off to fill their cupboards .
they are a small family with hardly any belongings .
the kids like to collect magnets from places they visit .
one neighbor recently came by and gave them some money to fill the refrigerator .
they all sleep in this small bedroom with the parents on the bed and the kids on the floor .
output.sentences: The kitchen could use a cleaning.
Someone is hungry so they go to the fridge.
They look for something to eat in it.
They take their snack back to the bedroom.
